Bootstrap Implementation for Partially Linear Regression Model

bootstrap_plr.Rd

Multiplier bootstrap to construct simultaneous confidence bands for multiple target coefficients in a partially linear regression model (PLR) with double machine learning.

bootstrap_plr(theta, d, u_hat, v_hat, v_hatd, inf_model, se, bootstrap,
  nRep)

Arguments

theta

final dml estimator for the partially linear model.
d

treatment variable.
u_hat

Residuals from \(y-g(x)\).
v_hat

Residuals from \(d-m(x)\).
v_hatd

Product of v_hat with d.
inf_model

Inference model for final estimation, default "IV-type" (...)
se

Estimated standard error from DML procedure.
bootstrap

Choice for implementation of multiplier bootstrap, can be set to "normal" (by default), "none", "Bayes", "wild".
nRep

Number of repetitions for multiplier bootstrap, by default nRep=500.

Value

List with bootstrapped standard errors (boot_se) and bootstrapped coefficients.
